phases.title: Planning & Requirements Definition
phases.text: Define purpose, user personas, and core features.
phases.output: Feature specification, wireframes, data flow diagrams

phases.title: Design & Prototyping
phases.text: Establish UX/UI design, confirm tech stack, and model data.
phases.output: High-fidelity mockups, API documentation, DB schema

phases.title: Backend Development
phases.text: Set up server and database, build APIs, and load Bible data.
phases.output: AWS infrastructure, authentication system, tested APIs

phases.title: App Development (Frontend)
phases.text: Build native Android/iOS UI, handle user inputs, integrate APIs.
phases.output: MVP mobile app with core features

phases.title: Integration & Testing
phases.text: Connect backend and app, perform QA, fix bugs, and optimize performance.
phases.output: QA reports, bug fixes, crash reporting

phases.title: Deployment & Operations
phases.text: Publish to App Store and Play Store, set up monitoring and feedback channels.
phases.output: Signed builds, store listings, monitoring system

phases.title: Maintenance & Enhancement
phases.text: Incorporate feedback, release updates, improve performance, and design new features.
phases.output: App updates, CI/CD pipeline, extended features
